subject: Re: Tesing-testing
author: rasterer
full_text:
BTW, the  17th is this coming Thursday.




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Starts out "next month the 17th" Don't know what that is, but I've heard it
> several times in various recordings. But wait, this is AM, where's the usual
> interference? At 5 seconds "Wait---Navy", maybe that has to do with the old
> disaster.
> 
>  Oh crap! I forgot to ask for the scientfic aproval before posting.
> Admittedly, I was being mean spirited on purpose, I'm not going to allow
> some science dork to brow beat me into submission. I believe the home page
> of EVP-ITC says something to the effect that we don't follow science, this
> is for sharing information, and using the cut and try method, see what
> works. I know everyone hears different, and that's ok, that does not
> invalidate this stuff. My apologies for ruffling feathers.
> 
>  F-S
>
